channel.title: Need some basic server help
channel.description:
I have a working 562, server runs and everything, ppl can play but... I was wonder how to change the logon meassage. The "welcome to -servername-" part. Also how can i change what your character says when they log on, or turn it off all together. And how can i edit Title on the client edit:another problem is i cant edit the stat bonuses of items. i tryed going into the itembonus's files and edited a few items. Nothing happend :confused:
tyvm :)

item.title: Need some basic server help
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

for a 562 you change the login message in actionsender.java ist usually in firstfolder<>src<>rs2hd<>io

if u cant find it press ctrl+F and search it.then when ur in actionsender.java ctrl+f and search welcome then change it to whatever you want.

remember to compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some basic server help
item.dc:creator: @LittleOtis LittleOtis
item.description:
@LittleOtis wrote:

couldnt find it in client.java or client.CLASS thanks for the help anyway

im using RuneSlay 562 client and source if that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Need some basic server help
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Uh…usually this thing can be edited in the server side.
In the server side, go to client.java, then find the text you want to edit. Hope this help.

Read full topic
